Summary: Was outside by myself when I saw what looked like a bright red slightly pulsating star
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside in my back yard and saw, in the eastern sky just above the horizon, what looked like red star. I called inside to my 13 year old daughter and had her look at it too. She saw it the same as I did. 5 minutes later my neighbor also came out and I pointed it out to him and he saw the same thing. This whole time it never moved at all. Then I put a post onto facebook and while I was getting comments about it being Mars or the Sirius star, the red light sped off straight up just like a really fast rocket and disappeared.
trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
There were 2 other sightings in Boise on or around December 24th 2011
